summary.title: Test Story
summary.about: This story is all about testing Storytime.  Want a real adventure?  Choose one of the other stories.  If you want to see how things are supposed to work, keep using this story.

1.title: The Cave
1.prose: First it's a good idea to set the scene.  What is going on?  Who is here?  Is there anything that stands out or seems odd. [p]This is supposed to be a new paragraph.

signpost.prompt: What would you like to do?

2.title: Intermediate Step
2.prose: This is to test dialogue. [p]"Look out," said the bandit. "Here comes the posse." [p]Sometimes we want to us [i]italics[/i]

3.title: You Lose
3.prose: Well that was predictable.  Try again and see if you can make better choices next time.

4.title: You Win
4.prose: Well what do you know.  Why not start over and try a different path.  It might be fun.

5.title: Loop Test
5.prose: The point of this step is to make a loop back into the story.

signpost.prompt: What would you like to do?

options.teaser: Back to previous step. (could be anywhere)
